data.text: @Cosmopolitan @LisaKayHawes I don’t know what the pictures say about her but boy do they tell the tale of rapid male pattern baldness.

@Cosmopolitan I'm going to reply to every story about the royal birth with a link to this story about African American women & babies dying in childbirth at 2x the rate of white women:
https://t.co/Y2k6Gvo58r
